titles: An acte of common Councell Where at a court of common Councell, holden at the Guildhall of this citty of London, on the tenth day of Nouember, in the xxix. yeere of the raigne of our soueraigne Lady the Queenes most excellent Maiesty that now is.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
publisher: By Hugh Singleton, printer for the cittie of London,
notes: Title from opening words of text. Publication date from STC.
Regarding "hallage" dues by cloth-buyers, etc.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
